author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Added first access checks to lock violation checks.
- Changed lock error to conform to RFC 4918.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Started running Litmus lock tests and adjusting lock plugin behaviour
# This resulted in some response changes, therefore some lock plugin client
# tests fail currently. Will be fixed later.
- Rewrote lock and etag violation checking (much cleaner code now).
- Made lock checks attach lockdiscovery property to error responses, to make
lock request handler generate special error responses.
# Avoids lots of checks for multi-status responses all over the plugin code.
- Made lockdiscovery and lockinfo property clone correctly.
- Fixed issues in lock plugin request handlers.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed locking of memory and file backend to release a hanging lock after wait
time has passed instead of throwing an exception.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Fixed issue #13901: Exceptions thrown in controllers are not catched for
